data.name: Corona Blossom Theme Song EP (Hi-Res Audio)
data.detailed_description:
High-Resolution Opening/Ending Theme EP for Corona Blossom.
Includes 2 tracks in both FLAC and WAV formats.

1. Happy! Corona Blossom
Vocals: Haruko Momoi

2. Be Myself
Vocals: Ayumi.(Astilbe x arendsii)


Note:
-You need a device which supports High-Resolution audio in order to properly play back these audio files.
-This EP is sold as DLC, and thus the files will be downloaded to the folder in which the game is installed. You can check the installation location of the game by right-clicking the game in the Library section of the Steam client and select Properties, followed by clicking "Browse Local Files..." on the "Local Files" tab.

FLAC:96kHz 24bit
WAV:96kHz 24bit、96kHz 32bit
